description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 6th January, 2023 at 16:00 EST. All bids submitted after 16:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Additional Information

* **Tender Description**: Amendment to Closing Time: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 6, 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. Parks Canada Agency requires several attachments for our existing road maintenance heavy equipment to ensure timely and consistent access to Park and Field Unit offices throughout Wood Buffalo National Park.
